https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wJOIXW4bjsXBPGzqojBV8laiLKM.jpg After "The Poseidon Adventure", in which the ship got flipped over by a tidal wave, the ship drifts bottom-up in the sea. While the passengers are still on board waiting to be rescued, two rivaling salvage parties enter the ship on search for money, gold and a small amount of plutonium. Beyond the Poseidon Adventure
